com.cloudera.oryx.api.speed

Interface SpeedModelManager<K,M,U>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - type of key read from input topic
    M - type of message read from input topic
    U - type of update message read/written
    All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ALSSpeedModelManager, ExampleSpeedModelManager, KMeansSpeedModelManager, RDFSpeedModelManager, ScalaSpeedModelManagerAdapter

    public interface SpeedModelManager<K,M,U>
extends Closeable
    Implementations of this interface maintain, in memory, the current state of a model in the speed layer. It is given a reference to stream of updates during initialization, and consumes models and new input, updates in-memory state, and produces updates accordingly.
    Since:
    2.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Iterable<U> buildUpdates(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaPairRDD<K,M> newData) 
      default void close() 
      void consume(Iterator<KeyMessage<String,U>> updateIterator, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration hadoopConf)
      Called by the framework to initiate a continuous process of reading models, and reading from the input topic and updating model state in memory, and issuing updates to the update topic.

    • Method Detail

      • consume

        void consume(Iterator<KeyMessage<String,U>> updateIterator,
             org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration hadoopConf)
      throws IOException
        Called by the framework to initiate a continuous process of reading models, and reading from the input topic and updating model state in memory, and issuing updates to the update topic. This will be executed asynchronously and may block.
        Parameters:
        updateIterator - iterator to read models from
        hadoopConf - Hadoop context, which may be required for reading from HDFS
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs while reading updates
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • buildUpdates

        Iterable<U> buildUpdates(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaPairRDD<K,M> newData)
                  throws IOException
        Parameters:
        newData - RDD of raw new data from the topic
        Returns:
        updates to publish on the update topic
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs while building updates
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • close

        default void close()
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
        Since:
        2.0.0
